content: नंदन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नंद्-ल्यु] Delighting, pleasing, gladdening; <ls>Ś. 7</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 21.</ls> --नः {@--1@} A son; <ls>Y. 1. 274</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 41.</ls> {@--2@} A frog. {@--3@} An epithet of Viṣṇu. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of the twentysixth year (संवत्सर). --ना A daughter. --नं {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the garden of Indra, the Elysium; अभिज्ञाश्छेदपातानां क्रियंते नंदनद्रुमाः <ls>Ku. 2. 41</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 95.</ls> {@--2@} Rejoicing, being glad. {@--3@} Joy.
